22  """This module represents Arabic language. 
23   
24  For more information, see U{http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arabic_language}

27  import re

29  from translate.lang import common

31 -def reverse_quotes(text): 

32      def convertquotation(match): 
33          return u"”%s“" % match.group(1) 

34      return re.sub(u'“([^”]+)”', convertquotation, text) 
35   
36   

37 -class ar(common.Common): 

38      """This class represents Arabic.""" 
39   
40      listseperator = u"، " 
41   
42      puncdict = { 
43          u",": u"،", 
44          u";": u"؛", 
45          u"?": u"؟", 
46          #This causes problems with variables, so commented out for now: 
47          #u"%": u"٪", 
48      } 
49   
50      ignoretests = ["startcaps", "simplecaps", "acronyms"] 
51   

52 -    def punctranslate(cls, text): 

53          text = super(cls, cls).punctranslate(text) 
54          return reverse_quotes(text) 

55      punctranslate = classmethod(punctranslate)
